roleset.name: include, incorporate

example.name: passive
example.text: The schools' central mission, educating children, became subsumed [*]by the competing interests of bureaucrats, politicians and unions.
example.arg: The schools' central mission, educating children,
the competing interests of bureaucrats, politicians and unions.

roleset.note: SUBSUME-V NOTES: Could there also be an agent? I'm unsure. (from subsume.01-v)
